subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Fabian Cancellara, a Swiss rider who as the world time-trial champion holds the title of the world’s fastest cyclist, won the opening prologue of the Tour de France on Saturday.
snippet: Fabian Cancellara, a Swiss rider who as the world time-trial champion holds the title of the world’s fastest cyclist, won the opening prologue of the Tour de France on Saturday.
